questions.question: Given the requirements for high availability, horizontal scalability, and the need to support both real-time and batch processing workloads, which architectural pattern would you recommend for the new data pipeline?

options.label: Lambda Architecture
options.description: Separate batch and speed layers with a serving layer that merges results, providing both accuracy and low latency

options.label: Kappa Architecture
options.description: Single stream processing layer that handles both real-time and reprocessing, simpler but requires careful design

options.label: Delta Architecture
options.description: Unified batch and streaming using Delta Lake, combining the benefits of data lakes with ACID transactions
